title: How to Make a Peasant's Macaroni Salad

steps.headline: Prepare the chicken breast.
steps.description: Cook if it isn't already, then shred.

steps.headline: Dice the carrots.
steps.description: The dicing should be very small.

steps.headline: Mix all of the ingredients in a large salad bowl.
Use salad spoons to stir thoroughly.
Refrigerate before eating.
steps.description: It needs to chill for at least half an hour to allow the flavors to infuse.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Crusty bread makes a good accompaniment.

text: Preparation Cook the macaroni. Follow the package instructions. Prepare the chicken breast. Cook if it isn't already, then shred. Dice the carrots. The dicing should be very small. Dice the apple. Again, dice very finely. Making the salad Mix all of the ingredients in a large salad bowl.  Use salad spoons to stir thoroughly.  Refrigerate before eating. It needs to chill for at least half an hour to allow the flavors to infuse. Serve. Crusty bread makes a good accompaniment. Finished.
